title: Please explain... Morgan lining/office
content:
We’re about to use MorganSans for a customer.

What’s the general difference between “Lining” and “Office” ??

[http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=16](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109095954/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=16 "http://www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page\_id=16")

TIA!

/Henriko
